quotes.quote: The belief that others think they are right doesn't mean that they are.
Few really believe. The most only believe that they believe or even make believe.
He does not believe that does not live according to his belief.
Never believe anything that requires you to hate people who do not believe it.
A wise man ... proportions his belief to the evidence.
You don't believe things because they make your life better, you believe them because they're true.
Beliefs create reality.
One person with a belief is equal to ninety nine who have only interests.
A widespread belief is more often likely to be foolish than sensible.
There can be no merit in believing something which you can neither explain nor understand.
Everything is possible for him who believes.
Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
It is one thing to believe and another to know.
Whatever you believe is true is true even if it is not true.
He who believes needs no explanation.
Remember that what you believe will depend very much on what you are.
The more we justify our beliefs, the more narrow-minded we become.
Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.
If you want to know what your true beliefs are, take a look at your actions.
All beliefs and belief systems boil down to having faith in something we would like to believe to be the truth.
Man is what he believes.
To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
He who does not know how to believe, should not know.
I ask you to believe nothing that you cannot verify for yourself.
When you believe it, you've created it, whatever it is.
Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.
Just as no one can be forced into belief, so no one can be forced into unbelief.
ur beliefs on you. It's always you who in the last instance can permit a belief to be true for you or not!
Every man prefers belief to the exercise of judgment.
Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
A belief is not an idea held by the mind, it is an idea that holds the mind.
A belief which leaves no place for doubt is not a belief; it is a superstition.
Men freely believe that which they desire.
Man is made by his belief. As he believes, so he is.
We are born believing. A man bears beliefs as a tree bears apples.
Believe in one thing too much and you have no room for new ideas.
First we have to believe, and then we believe.
You will only rise to the level of your belief.
An old belief is like an old shoe.  We so value its comfort that we fail to notice the hole in it.
As a man believes, so he will act.
Belief is a beautiful armor, but it makes for the heaviest sword.
In the end you regret less the things you believed that weren't true than the things that never came true because you didn't believe.
Belief is the wound that knowledge heals.
It's what you choose to believe that makes you the person you are.
Generally the theories we believe we call facts, and the facts we disbelieve we call theories.
Belief gets in the way of learning.
Belief is the death of intelligence.
When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.
Belief creates the actual fact.
